name: [O]HuuugeHarrrdGravityBall
description:
Logical platform game made during Huuuge Game Jam in 24 hours.

Controls:

Keyboard: Arrows or WASD - movement, Spacebar - Jump, ESC - Quit

Gamepad: Left stick - movement, A - Jump

Made using Unreal Engine.

Team:

Dariusz Ruta - programming, design, art
